alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 12:52PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT CENTRAL ALLEGANY...SOUTHWESTERN MORGAN...NORTHEASTERN MINERAL AND WEST CENTRAL BERKELEY COUNTIES... At 1251 PM EST, an area of heavy snow was located near Paw Paw, moving southeast at 20 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. Locations impacted include... Cumberland, Paw Paw, Greenwood, La Vale, Ridgeley, Cresaptown, Potomac Park, Wiley Ford, Ellerslie, Corriganville, Oldtown, Spring Gap, Fishers Bridge, Pumpkin Center, North Branch, Oakland, Rock Gap, Brady, Wolfe Mill and Unger. Icy roads are possible as the snow melts on the roads then quickly refreezes.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany
